description.p: The Wolf of Gond is a gift for only his most trusted followers, an automaton wolf made by his own hands. When not in use, the wolf compacts into a small cube, roughly 4 inches in diameter. Only a true folower can awaken the Wolf in a time of need.

description.p: The Wolf of Gond has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

description.p: The Wolf of Gond has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

description.p: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
